data.title: Film Forum at Montclair State
data.text: Film Forum at Montclair State is an initiative dedicated to the preservation, growth and enrichment of the art of film through research, education, professional development and community programming. Based within the College of the Arts at Montclair State University and supported by the School of Communication and Media, Film Forum leverages our wonderfully dedicated Filmmaking faculty, the Universityâ€™s rich resources in film and film scholarship together with the impressive array of film industry assets and opportunities in New York City, New Jersey, and Los Angeles.
